cast.overview: Jaded ex-CIA operative John Creasy reluctantly accepts a job as the bodyguard for a 10-year-old girl in Mexico City. They clash at first, but eventually bond, and when she's kidnapped he's consumed by fury and will stop at nothing to save her life.
cast.title: Man on Fire

details.biography: Norma Pablo is a Mexican actress, originally from Mexico City, who, after completing her studies in Hispanic literature at UNAM, trained as an actress at the National Institute of Fine Arts, taking acting and acting improvement courses with teachers such as Alberto Estrella and Raúl Zermeño.
details.name: Norma Pablo
